column2: Social protection and poverty: Ensure fair, inclusive and ethical value chains. Ensure workers’ social protection and housing conditions, promote socially responsible production methods, Mitigate the socio- economic consequences impacting the food chain and ensure that the key principles enshrined in the European Pillar of Social Rights are respected, especially when it comes to precarious, seasonal and undeclared workers.
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Social Security - Workers Protection" because it focuses on ensuring fair and inclusive value chains, protecting workers' social rights, and promoting socially responsible production methods.

column2: Animal welfare: Promote better animal welfare to improve animal health and food quality.
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Food quality - Animal Welfare" because it aims to promote better animal welfare, which is directly related to food quality.

column2: Food messaging: Provide food information and labelling to empower consumers to make informed, healthy and sustainable food choices. Strengthen educational messages on the importance of healthy nutrition, sustainable food production and consumption, and reducing food waste
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Food quality - Healthy Food" because it focuses on providing food information and labelling to promote healthy and sustainable food choices.

column2: Food availability: Improve availability of sustainable food. Ensure that the healthy option is always the easiest one. Ensure food supply.
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Food affordability" because it aims to improve the availability of sustainable food and ensure that healthy options are easily accessible.

column2: Food affordability: Ensure affordability to sufficient, nutritious and sustainable food
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Food affordability" because it directly focuses on ensuring that food is affordable and sustainable.

column2: Properties of food: Increase reformulation of food products in line with guidelines for healthy and sustainable diets
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Food quality - Healthy Food" because it aims to reformulate food products to make them healthier and more sustainable.

column2: Food security: Ensuring food security and access to quality, safe, sustainable, nutritious food for all.
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Food affordability" because it focuses on ensuring access to quality and nutritious food for all.

column2: Nutrition and healthy, sustainable diets: Move to healthier and more sustainable diets.
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Food quality - Healthy Food" because it aims to promote healthier and more sustainable diets.

column2: Health impact of diets: Reversing of the rise in overweight and obesity rates across the EU by 2030
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Food quality - Healthy Food" because it focuses on reversing the rise in overweight and obesity rates, which is related to healthy diets.

column2: Preparedness, shock resilience, adaptation and transformation: Strengthen the resilience of the EU food system. Build up resilience to climate change, possible future diseases and pandemics. Increasing the sustainability of food producers will ultimately increase their resilience.
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Competitive Agriculture" because it aims to strengthen the resilience of the EU food system and increase the sustainability of food producers.

column2: 1.a Legally protect a minimum of 30% of the EU’s land area
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation" because it focuses on legally protecting a minimum of 30% of the EU's land area, which is directly related to biodiversity conservation.

column2: 1.b Legally protect a minimum of 30% of the EU's sea area
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation - Fisheries" because it focuses on protecting the EU's sea area, which is related to fisheries and marine biodiversity.

column2: 2.a Strictly protect at least a third of the EU'S protected areas
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation" because it aims to strictly protect at least a third of the EU's protected areas, which is directly related to biodiversity conservation.

column2: 2b. Strictly protect all remaining EU primary and old- growth forests
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration - Forests" because it focuses on strictly protecting the EU's primary and old-growth forests, which is related to forest ecosystem restoration.

column2: 4. By 2030, significant areas of degraded and carbon-rich ecosystems are restored. Habitats and species show no deterioration in conservation trends and status, and at least 30% reach favourable conservation status or at least show a positive trend.
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration" because it aims to restore degraded and carbon-rich ecosystems, which is directly related to ecosystem restoration.

column2: 5. The decline of pollinators is reversed
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation" because it focuses on reversing the decline of pollinators, which is directly related to biodiversity conservation.

column2: 6. The risk and use of chemical pesticides is reduced by 50%, and the use of more hazardous pesticides is reduced by 50%
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Pesticides Reduction" because it aims to reduce the risk and use of chemical pesticides, which is directly related to pesticide reduction.

column2: 7. At least 10% of agricultural area is under high-diversity landscape features
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration - Agricultural Ecosystems" because it focuses on increasing the area of high-diversity landscape features in agriculture, which is related to agricultural ecosystem restoration.

column2: 9. Three billion trees are planted in the EU, in full respect of ecological principles
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration - Forests" because it aims to plant three billion trees in the EU, which is directly related to forest ecosystem restoration.

column2: 11. At least 25.000 km of free-flowing rivers are restored
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration - Rivers" because it focuses on restoring free-flowing rivers, which is directly related to river ecosystem restoration.

column2: 12. There is a 50% reduction in the number of Red List species threatened by Invasive Alien Species (IAS)
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation" because it aims to reduce the number of Red List species threatened by invasive alien species, which is directly related to biodiversity conservation.

column2: 13. The losses of nutrients from fertilisers are reduced by 50%, resulting in the reduction of the use of fertilisers by at least 20%
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Soils Health" because it focuses on reducing nutrient losses from fertilizers, which is directly related to soil health.

column2: 14. Cities with at least 20.000 inhabitants have an ambitious Urban Greening Plan
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation - Urban Nature" because it aims to promote urban greening plans in cities, which is related to urban nature and biodiversity conservation.

column2: In accordance with the CFP, it is crucial to continue and accelerate the work of rebuilding and keeping fish stocks above MSY levels
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation - Fisheries" because it focuses on rebuilding and keeping fish stocks above MSY levels, which is directly related to fisheries and marine biodiversity.

column2: Terrestrial ecosystems. Member States shall put in place [...] measures [...] to jointly cover, as a Union target, throughout the areas and ecosystems [...] defined in Art. 2, by 2030, at least 20% of land areas in need of restoration and, by 2050, all ecosystems in need of restoration.
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration" because it aims to restore terrestrial ecosystems, which is directly related to ecosystem restoration.

column2: Marine ecosystems. Member States shall put in place [...] measures [...] to jointly cover, as a Union target, throughout the areas and ecosystems [...] defined in Art. 2, by 2030, at least 20% of sea areas in need of restoration and, by 2050, all ecosystems in need of restoration.
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Marine Ecosystem Restoration" because it focuses on restoring marine ecosystems, which is directly related to marine ecosystem restoration.

column2: Terrestrial, coastal and freshwater ecosystems. Member States shall put in place the restoration measures [...] to improve to good condition areas of habitat types listed in Annex I which are not in good condition.
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration" because it aims to restore terrestrial, coastal, and freshwater ecosystems, which is directly related to ecosystem restoration.

column2: Terrestrial, coastal and freshwater ecosystems. Member States shall put in place the restoration measures [...] to re-establish the habitat types listed in Annex I in areas not covered by those habitat types
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration" because it focuses on re-establishing habitat types in areas not covered by those habitat types, which is directly related to ecosystem restoration.

column2: Terrestrial, coastal and freshwater ecosystems. Member States shall put in place the restoration measures for the terrestrial, coastal and freshwater habitats of the species listed in Annexes II, IV and V
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation" because it aims to restore habitats for species listed in Annexes II, IV, and V, which is directly related to biodiversity conservation.

column2: Terrestrial, coastal and freshwater ecosystems. Member States shall ensure that condition is known for at least 90% of the area distributed overall habitat types listed in Annex I by 2030 and 100% by 2040.
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation - Monitoring" because it focuses on monitoring the condition of habitat types, which is directly related to biodiversity conservation monitoring.

column2: Terrestrial, coastal and freshwater ecosystems. Member States shall ensure that there is: (a) an increase of habitat area in good condition for habitat types listed in Annex I
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration" because it aims to increase the area of habitats in good condition, which is directly related to ecosystem restoration.

column2: (urban ecosystems) By 2030, Member States shall ensure that there is no net loss in the total national area of urban green space, and of urban tree canopy cover in urban ecosystem areas.
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation - Urban Nature" because it focuses on maintaining urban green space and tree canopy cover, which is related to urban nature and biodiversity conservation.

column2: (urban ecosystems) Member States shall achieve thereafter an increasing trend in the total national area of urban green space, including through the integration of urban green space into buildings and infrastructure
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation - Urban Nature" because it aims to increase the area of urban green space, which is directly related to urban nature and biodiversity conservation.

column2: (urban ecosystems) Member States shall achieve, in each urban ecosystem area, determined in accordance with Article 14(4), an increasing trend of urban tree canopy cover
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation - Urban Nature" because it focuses on increasing urban tree canopy cover, which is directly related to urban nature and biodiversity conservation.

column2: Natural connectivity of rivers and natural functions of the related floodplains. Member States shall make an inventory of artificial barriers and remove them to connectivity of surface waters
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration - Rivers" because it aims to restore natural connectivity of rivers and remove artificial barriers, which is directly related to river ecosystem restoration.

column2: (pollinator) Member States shall, by putting in place in a timely manner appropriate and effective measures, improve pollinator diversity and reverse the decline of pollinator populations
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation" because it focuses on improving pollinator diversity and reversing the decline of pollinator populations, which is directly related to biodiversity conservation.

column2: Marine ecosystems. Member States shall put in place the restoration measures [...] to improve [...] areas of habitat types listed in Annex II which are not in good condition.
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Marine Ecosystem Restoration" because it aims to restore marine ecosystems, which is directly related to marine ecosystem restoration.

column2: ecosystems. Member States shall put in place the restoration measures that are necessary to re-establish the habitat types of groups 1-6 listed in Annex II
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Marine Ecosystem Restoration" because it focuses on re-establishing habitat types in marine ecosystems, which is directly related to marine ecosystem restoration.

column2: Marine ecosystems. Member States shall ensure, by 2030 at the latest, that the condition is known for at least 50% of the area distributed over all habitat types listed in groups 1–6 of Annex II.
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Biodiversity Protection & Conservation - Monitoring" because it aims to monitor the condition of marine habitat types, which is directly related to biodiversity conservation monitoring.

column2: (agricultural ecosystems) Member States shall put in place measures which shall aim to achieve an increasing trend at national level of at least two out of the three following indicators in agricultural ecosystems
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration - Agricultural Ecosystems" because it focuses on improving indicators in agricultural ecosystems, which is directly related to agricultural ecosystem restoration.

column2: (agricultural ecosystems) Member States shall put in place restoration measures which shall aim to ensure that the common farmland bird index at national level based on the species specified in Annex V reaches the following levels
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration - Agricultural Ecosystems" because it aims to restore farmland bird populations, which is directly related to agricultural ecosystem restoration.

column2: (agricultural ecosystems) Member States shall put in place measures which shall aim to restore organic soils in agricultural use constituting drained peatlands.
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Soils Health" because it focuses on restoring organic soils in agricultural use, which is directly related to soil health.

column2: (trees) When identifying and implementing the restoration measures to meet the objectives and obligations set out in Articles 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 and 10, Member States shall aim to contribute to the commitment of planting at least three billion additional trees by 2030
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration - Forests" because it aims to plant additional trees, which is directly related to forest ecosystem restoration.

column2: (forest ecosystems) Member States shall achieve an increasing trend at national level of at least six out of seven of the following indicators in forest ecosystems
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration - Forests" because it focuses on improving indicators in forest ecosystems, which is directly related to forest ecosystem restoration.

column2: (forest ecosystems) Member States shall achieve an increasing trend at national level of the common forest bird index
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Terrestrial Ecosystems Restoration - Forests" because it aims to restore forest bird populations, which is directly related to forest ecosystem restoration.

column2: Reach no net land take
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Soils Health" because it focuses on reaching no net land take, which is directly related to soil health.

column2: Member States shall take the measures necessary to ensure that water intended for human consumption is wholesome and clean
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Water Quality" because it aims to ensure that water intended for human consumption is wholesome and clean, which is directly related to water quality.

column2: The Ambient Air Quality Directives set EU air quality standards for 12 air pollutants
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Air Quality" because it focuses on setting EU air quality standards, which is directly related to air quality improvement.

column2: The Water Reuse Regulation aim to encourage and facilitate water reuse in the EU
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Water Quality" because it aims to encourage and facilitate water reuse, which is directly related to water quality improvement.

column2: The Industrial Emissions Directive (IED) aims at preventing or reducing emissions from large industrial installations and intensive farming into the environment.
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Air Quality" because it focuses on preventing or reducing emissions from industrial installations and intensive farming, which is directly related to air quality improvement.

column2: The revised Urban Wastewater Treatment Directive (UWWTD) extends the scope of the 1991 UWWTD
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Water Quality" because it aims to improve urban wastewater treatment, which is directly related to water quality improvement.

column2: Improve soil quality by reducing chemical pesticides’ use by 50%, by 2030
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Soils Health" because it focuses on reducing chemical pesticides' use, which is directly related to soil health.

column2: Improve soil quality by reducing nutrient losses use by 50%, by 2030
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Soils Health" because it aims to reduce nutrient losses, which is directly related to soil health.

column2: Improve air quality to reduce the number of premature deaths caused by air pollution by 55% by 2030
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Air Quality" because it focuses on reducing premature deaths caused by air pollution, which is directly related to air quality improvement.

column2: Improve water quality by reducing waste, plastic litter at sea (by 50%)
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Water Quality" because it aims to reduce waste and plastic litter at sea, which is directly related to water quality improvement.

column2: Improve water quality by reducing microplastics released into the environment (by 30%)
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Water Quality" because it focuses on reducing microplastics released into the environment, which is directly related to water quality improvement.

column2: Reduce by 25% the EU ecosystems where air pollution threatens biodiversity, by 2030
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Air Quality" because it aims to reduce the number of EU ecosystems where air pollution threatens biodiversity, which is directly related to air quality improvement.

column2: Reduce the share of people chronically disturbed by transport noise by 30%, by 2030
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Noise Reduction" because it focuses on reducing the share of people chronically disturbed by transport noise, which is directly related to noise reduction.

column2: Having all soils in healthy condition by 2050
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Soils Health" because it aims to have all soils in healthy condition, which is directly related to soil health.

column2: By means of an updated and harmonised list of pollutants affecting surface and groundwater, updated existing quality standards, new monitoring requirements, improved and more accessible data, and a more flexible framework for addressing pollutants of emerging concerns
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the sub-theme "Improve Water Quality" because it focuses on updating and harmonizing the list of pollutants affecting surface and groundwater, which is directly related to water quality improvement.
